txt.en: Complete Book 6 Chapter 9: The Mirror of Galadriel
You helped the dwarves of the Iron Garrison drive the Watcher in the Water from the Black Pool and opened the Hollin Gate.
You helped the dwarves under B贸si's command to clear the Great Delving and Durin's Way of hostile forces, leading you to the Twenty-first Hall.
Unravel the epic story of the Mines of Moria.
You performed many tasks for the dwarves of the Iron Garrison, culminating in the revelation of the fate of Balin's Company.
You helped the Iron Garrison prepare for an assault by the Orcs of Moria and faced the Watcher in the Water once more, discovering Br贸in alive in the vile creature's den.
You helped defend against the assaults of Mazog's host, but were forced to leave Bori behind to be captured.
The Nameless arose under the leadership of the vile Gwathnor, but you prevailed and the demon was defeated.
